name: propeller_aero_challenge
description: We've tiled a high res image into a set of tiles in the 'tiled' folder (un-tiled.jpg is just for reference).  Create a simple frontend app in your framework of choice that displays them in the style of a 2D map view.  The app should be self contained and simple for us to build and run (e.g. provide npm install/build/start).
author: Pawel Christow
